thread.title: Soap | Fair City

author: Sheena McGinley
title: Soap | Fair City
text: Orla announces she is moving out of Molloy's, which is unsurprising given they're accusing her of being a lush. Unfortunately, her move prompts Wayne to deliver a devastating blow. Have they reached the point of no return?! Sparks fly between Ama and Shane (I'm telling ya, they'll be at it all weekend), and Charlotte is determined to get her own back when Nina lands her in trouble with Decco. Paul realises his flirtations with Jackie could be making Niamh jealous. You don't say, Paul?! Sure she's only been making moo-eyes at you for the last two months.
